item.title: Human-centred design
item.description: A creative approach that aims to factor in people at the centre of the development process. Allows designers and builders to create solutions that resonates with and tailors to a target audience’s needs.

item.title: Learning in public
item.description: An extension of [[building in public]], where the individual opens up their learning process for the public to view.[^1] Why do I want to learn in public?

item.title: Peer helping
item.description: A variety of interpersonal helping behaviours assumed by trained individuals who undertake a helping role with others. Based on the basis that many individuals (especially students) are likely to first turn to their peers for help before approaching a trusted adult.
